item.title: Ethical Hacking Challenge: Decode the Server Heist, Defend Your Digital Data
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üõ°Ô∏è Learn about SQL Injection (SQLi) attacks and their impact on database security. These attacks exploit application vulnerabilities to manipulate SQL queries, leading to unauthorized access and data theft. Consequences include credential theft, data alteration, and even system access. Stay informed and protect your digital data! üîê #CyberSecurity #EthicalHacking #SQLInjection #DataProtection #TechAwareness

item.title: Getting Started with NVIDIA Isaac for Healthcare Using the Telesurgery Workflow

item.description:
üöÄ Telesurgery is transforming healthcare delivery as the shortage of surgeons rises. With advancements in 5G and AI, experts can now operate remotely, shifting from experimental to essential. üåç NVIDIA Isaac for Healthcare offers a modular workflow that includes video streaming, robot control, and simulation tools. This enables seamless training and clinical deployment. Learn how this technology is paving the way for the next generation of surgical robotics. ü§ñüí° #Telesurgery‚Ä¶

item.title: Make Your Website Conversational for People and Agents with NLWeb and AutoRAG
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
Transform your website with NLWeb and Cloudflare‚Äôs AutoRAG! üåê‚ú® This new approach shifts from traditional keyword searches to a conversational model, helping users and AI agents find answers more effectively. NLWeb, developed by Microsoft, standardizes natural-language queries, while AutoRAG manages content retrieval seamlessly. Together, they make websites AI-ready, improving user experience and opening new monetization opportunities for publishers. #WebInnovation #ConversationalAI #NLWeb‚Ä¶

item.title: Policy as code, explained
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ Policy as code is transforming IT operations by automating compliance checks in infrastructure deployments. This approach allows for quick verification of stakeholder requirements, moving away from slow, error-prone manual processes. With customizable policy languages, organizations can effectively manage security, compliance, and architecture. Learn more about how companies like Fannie Mae and Wayfair are implementing this strategy. #PolicyAsCode #ITOperations #Infrastructure #Automation‚Ä¶

item.title: Simplify local prototyping with Camel JBang infrastructure
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ Apache Camel simplifies integration with systems like databases and APIs through minimal coding. üåü Camel JBang, a command-line interface, enhances prototyping by allowing rapid creation and testing of integration flows without complex setups. üîß Its infra command quickly launches backends like Kafka or ActiveMQ, streamlining the development process and reducing setup time. For more details, check out the full article! #ApacheCamel #CamelJBang #Integration #Development #Prototyping

Source: Red Hat Developer Blog
Author: Bruno Meseguer
Category: educational

item.title: How to prompt Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Generation for the best results
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
Unlock the potential of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image! üåü This advanced model combines text and image processing for seamless image generation. Key features include: - Text-to-image: Create images from descriptions. - Image editing: Use text to modify existing images. - Multi-image composition: Combine multiple images into one. Learn how to write effective prompts to enhance results. Descriptive narratives yield better images than simple keywords. Start creating in Google AI Studio today!‚Ä¶

Source: Google Developers Blog

Category: educational

item.title: Self-Assessing your Enterprise Strategy and Planning maturity
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
Assessing your enterprise strategy and planning maturity is key for continuous improvement. üìà Organizations must understand their position on the maturity spectrum to enhance alignment and execution. This can lead to better revenue generation, cost savings, and risk mitigation. Atlassian emphasizes the importance of setting and operationalizing strategy through six facets: Goals, Funds, Work, Systems, Talent, and Updates. Utilize this assessment as a benchmark and revisit it regularly. üóìÔ∏è‚Ä¶

Source: Atlassian Developer Blog

item.title: How Google‚Äôs AI can help transform health professions education
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
Google‚Äôs AI is shaping the future of health professions education. üåç With a projected shortage of over 11 million healthcare workers by 2030, AI tools are being explored to enhance medical learning. Two studies reveal how Google‚Äôs AI models can serve as personalized learning aids for medical students. The first study focused on using generative AI to support clinical reasoning, while the second assessed LearnLM, an AI model tailored for education. Results show strong interest in AI that‚Ä¶
